name: Zombies Rocket Boom Boom
description:
Welcome in this casual game of Zombies Rocket Boom Boom.

Your main mission is to destroy all the zombies with your rockets in all the levels. In each level you'll have a limited number of rockets, but at the same time you will have obstacles that defend the zombies from the rockets to make you lose the level in the end.

Pay maximum attention to your ammunition because they are limited. Try to calculate accurately and shoot without regrets.

You must win and kill all the zombies! Good Luck!

Game Features :
- 27 levels
- Limited number of rockets
- Difficult situations to shoot
- Score
